properties.areaDesc: Potomac/Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 4:02AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches
in the valleys, with 6 to 10 inches possible over Marias Pass.
Winds gusting up to 35 mph over Marias Pass.

* WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan
Lake, Marias Pass, Polebridge, Highway 200 Bonner to
Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East
Missoula to Bearmouth.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility over Marias Pass.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY
